page.title: 12EPPING'S COMMUNITY HOSPITAL
page.content: People in Epping have proved their {support}for their community hospital by raising a large amount of money over the years. The most recent efforts have been an appeal for a {mammography scanner}which was launched in April 1984 for Â£70,000: by June 1985 Â£79,500 had been raised. Local people again joined with staff of Walthamstow Bus Garage in raising Â£4,500 in the last two years for two {heart machines. It will cause great sadness if the hospital comes to a close completely. This, we hope, will never happen, but in 1985 expensive equipment and an ageing community mean a new hospital system_{"Core and cluster".}Sadly the core is in Harlow, not Epping.
